item.title: CVE-2023-0812|2024-08-02T05:24:34.384Z -- unknown -- active%20directory%20integration%20%2F%20ldap%20integration
item.description: The Active Directory Integration / LDAP Integration WordPress plugin before 4.1.1 does not have proper authorization or nonce values for some POST requests, leading to unauthenticated data disclosure.
